name: VZVirtioSocketListener
desc: An object that listens for port-based connection requests from the guest operating system.

items.name: var delegate: VZVirtioSocketListenerDelegate?
items.desc: The custom object you use to respond to port-based connection attempts.

items.name: protocol VZVirtioSocketListenerDelegate
items.desc: An interface you use to manage connections between the guest operating system and host computer.
